ygData.subject: Re: Casters' Stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: Leshrec Help me get a LJ staff for my Druid pls 8). heheh ... -- Gary Qui Hong Loong Technical Support Executive Pacific Internet Technical Support Department
ygData.messageBody:
Leshrec Help me get a LJ staff for my Druid pls 8). heheh

Leshrec wrote:

> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>
> Staff of writhing is not 2hd blunt, its 1hd blunt. Btw, at higher level, I
> think casters can hold a book which +30 mana and +int too. I saw from
> webpages that you need to hold that in primary hand, so NO weapon )
> -----Original Message-----
> From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Monday, July 12, 1999 9:50 AM
> Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Casters' Stuff
>
> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> >It's best to use melee and casting for casters till u reach lvl 12. Too
> >dependent on casting alone at early stages will be u a pure mage which cant
> >do any soloing. Not to forget we casters are rising melee skill at
> >3x(lvl+1), and gap only widen all the way as compared to other classes. If
> >u dun use it now, I guess u wont use it in future. ;)
> >
> >
> >Ziltus, the wiz who tank with his body.
> >
> >
> >On Saturday, 10 July, 1999 12:42 PM, Synzzz [SMTP:hannibal@...]
> >wrote:
> >> From: "Synzzz" <hannibal@...>
> >>
> >> Actually,
> >>
> >> Everntually we might not even hold any weapon! Hehe
> >> I'm starting to find my weapon hands unused more often than not...
> >> Too busy casting to actually go and physically attack. Yeah..i want
> >> that skull too...sigh
> >>
> >> Zanderion (Unlucky Lvl Magi)
> >>
> >> ----- Original Message -----
> >> From: Ebon Praetor <kelc@...>
> >> To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> >> Sent: Saturday, July 10, 1999 2:33 AM
> >> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Casters' Stuff
> >>
> >>
> >> > From: "Ebon Praetor" <kelc@...>
> >> >
> >> > > > 1. Is the RTS the best 2HB weapon one can get?? Or are there more?
> >> sounds
> >> > > limited if it is... Any DMG stat?
> >> > > No, best 2HB shld be staff of writhing? Give 11 dam and pretty cool
> >> stats
> >> > > if I'm not wrong. RTS is the 'affordable' poor man kinda 2HB staff
> >fo
> >> > > casters.
> >> >
> >> >
> >> > It might be a good idea to start practicing the 1H skills as well,
> >> > especially 1H staff...
> >> >
> >> > It seems there are a lot of cool items for casters that must be held
> >> > in the hand, which precludes 2-handed weapons.
> >> >
> >> > I have a RTS which I bought for 15 pp, but still keep my GS Fang
> >> > for practice... thinking of practicing with cracked staff also.
> >> >
> >> > I WANT A SKULL OF JHEN'TRA!!!!
> >> >
> >> > *heh*
> >> >
> >> >
> >> > --
> >> >
> >> >
> >> > Love is in the air...
> >> > Get me a gas mask, quick!!!
> >> >
> >> > Cya,
> >> > Praetor
